metadata.title: CVE-2024-32613 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: HDF5 Library through 1.14.3 contains a heap-based buffer over-read in thefunction H5HL__fl_deserialize in H5HLcache.c, a different vulnerabilitythan CVE-2024-32612.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
